item.title: Derivation of the Formula to Calculate the Distance Between Two Parallel Lines
item.description: Formulas $$ d=\frac { |2k| }{ \sqrt { m^{ 2 }+1 } } $$ Explanation When solving problems involving the tangent to a conic section, one often needs to calculate the distance between two tangents. While it’s not particularly challenging, thanks to the formula for the distance from a given point to a line, having an easy and quick formula for this distance can help to reduce calculation time. Derivation
